_header: I pray thee spirit that angel art
_description: A prayer to the guardian angel — ten quatrains (abab, abcb)

CULIi643.First Lines:
I Praye þe spirit þat angell arteTo whom y am be
                    take…
CULIi643.Last Lines:
…That my sowle came froEuer in ioye with angeles to synge
                    Amen
CULIi643.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 202-4.
